question: Which regional cinema is got promoted through the "St.Barth Film Festival"?
explanation: St.Barth Film Festival, also known as St.Barts Festival of Caribbean Cinema, is a film festival held annually at the end of April in the Saint Barthelemy island, an overseas collectivity of France, in the West Indies region of the Caribbean Sea. This film festival widely promotes the Caribbean cinema which offers a glimpse into the unique arts and culture scene of the Caribbean basin.
